an9.39:1.2: Tasmiṃ kho pana, bhikkhave, saṅgāme asurā jiniṃsu, devā parājayiṃsu.
an9.39:1.3: Parājitā ca, bhikkhave, devā apayiṃsuyeva uttarenābhimukhā, abhiyiṃsu asurā.
an9.39:1.7: Dutiyampi kho, bhikkhave, devā asurehi saṅgāmesuṃ.
an9.39:1.8: Dutiyampi kho, bhikkhave, asurāva jiniṃsu, devā parājayiṃsu.
an9.39:1.9: Parājitā ca, bhikkhave, devā apayiṃsuyeva uttarenābhimukhā, abhiyiṃsu asurā.
an9.39:2.4: Tatiyampi kho, bhikkhave, devā asurehi saṅgāmesuṃ.
an9.39:2.5: Tatiyampi kho, bhikkhave, asurāva jiniṃsu, devā parājayiṃsu.
an9.39:2.6: Parājitā ca, bhikkhave, devā bhītā devapuraṃyeva pavisiṃsu.
an9.39:2.8: ‘bhīruttānagatena kho dāni mayaṃ etarahi attanā viharāma akaraṇīyā asurehī’ti.
an9.39:2.10: ‘bhīruttānagatena kho dāni devā etarahi attanā viharanti akaraṇīyā amhehī’ti.
an9.39:3.2: Tasmiṃ kho pana, bhikkhave, saṅgāme devā jiniṃsu, asurā parājayiṃsu.
an9.39:3.3: Parājitā ca, bhikkhave, asurā apayiṃsuyeva dakkhiṇenābhimukhā, abhiyiṃsu devā.
an9.39:3.7: Dutiyampi kho, bhikkhave, asurā devehi saṅgāmesuṃ.
an9.39:3.8: Dutiyampi kho, bhikkhave, devā jiniṃsu, asurā parājayiṃsu.
an9.39:3.9: Parājitā ca, bhikkhave, asurā apayiṃsuyeva dakkhiṇenābhimukhā, abhiyiṃsu devā.
an9.39:4.4: Tatiyampi kho, bhikkhave, asurā devehi saṅgāmesuṃ.
an9.39:4.5: Tatiyampi kho, bhikkhave, devā jiniṃsu, asurā parājayiṃsu.
an9.39:4.6: Parājitā ca, bhikkhave, asurā bhītā asurapuraṃyeva pavisiṃsu.
an9.39:4.8: ‘bhīruttānagatena kho dāni mayaṃ etarahi attanā viharāma akaraṇīyā devehī’ti.
an9.39:4.10: ‘bhīruttānagatena kho dāni asurā etarahi attanā viharanti akaraṇīyā amhehī’ti.
an9.39:5.1: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, yasmiṃ samaye bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati,
an9.39:5.2: tasmiṃ, bhikkhave, samaye bhikkhussa evaṃ hoti:
an9.39:5.3: ‘bhīruttānagatena kho dānāhaṃ etarahi attanā viharāmi akaraṇīyo mārassā’ti.
an9.39:5.5: ‘bhīruttānagatena kho dāni bhikkhu etarahi attanā viharati akaraṇīyo mayhan’ti.
an9.39:6.1: Yasmiṃ, bhikkhave, samaye bhikkhu vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā …pe… dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ …
an9.39:6.4: tasmiṃ, bhikkhave, samaye bhikkhussa evaṃ hoti:
an9.39:6.5: ‘bhīruttānagatena kho dānāhaṃ etarahi attanā viharāmi akaraṇīyo mārassā’ti.
an9.39:6.7: ‘bhīruttānagatena kho dāni bhikkhu etarahi attanā viharati, akaraṇīyo mayhan’ti.
an9.39:7.1: Yasmiṃ, bhikkhave, samaye bhikkhu sabbaso rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārā ‘ananto ākāso’ti ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati.
an9.39:7.2: Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, ‘bhikkhu antamakāsi māraṃ, apadaṃ vadhitvā māracakkhuṃ adassanaṃ gato pāpimato tiṇṇo loke visattikan’ti.
an9.39:8.1: Yasmiṃ, bhikkhave, samaye bhikkhu sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma ‘anantaṃ viññāṇan’ti viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati …
an9.39:8.2: sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma ‘natthi kiñcī’ti ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati …
an9.39:8.3: sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samatikkamma nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati …
an9.39:8.4: sabbaso nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samatikkamma saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ upasampajja viharati, paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti.
an9.39:8.5: Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, ‘bhikkhu antamakāsi māraṃ, apadaṃ vadhitvā māracakkhuṃ adassanaṃ gato pāpimato tiṇṇo loke visattikan’”ti.
